markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 458 <sup>2.0</sup>

A mental effect can alter the target’s mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.
name: Mental
